nodes.text: He recommanded changing the system of electing the country's lower house of parliament the State Duma to a purely proportional system
strong political parties must become one of the tools for mobilising the entire society to conducts the fight against terrorism
If the proportional system is introduced in the State Duma the strogest political parties will be sensibly benefited
control from the central government was the key
The best means to strenghten the central control is to strenghten the strong political parties that support the central government
The organizers and perpretators of hte terror attack are aiming at the disintegration of the state the break-up of Russia
The goal is to avoid the disintegration of Russia
The only means to avoid the disintegration of Russia is to stenghten the central control
